hero.title: About FreeTransferFee!
hero.subtitle: The FreeTransferFee platform is an energy exchange platform in wave field ecology. Our goal is to reduce the TRX fee required for wave traders to consume energy. The exchange process is simple and fast, with a favorable price. We provide you with a safer and more efficient energy exchange service 24 hours a day.
hero.globe_title: Craft Stunning, High-Performance Websites with Ease and Speed

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Transfer Times Purchase
features.astro: Solve the problem of excessive TRX fees，Money Saving Expert for Tron Users
features.alpine: Applicable to USDT, contract transfer, etc

sub.title.how: How to purchase number of times
sub.description.how: Fill in your estimated daily number of times transactions and transfer TRX/USDT payment to designation billing address.
sub.description.when: After the payment is completed,the energy will be received within 6 second. In rare cases, there will be a delay of 30 to 60 seconds.
sub.title.time: How many orders can I have at the same time?
sub.description.time: Multiple purchases can be made under the same address, with no limits.
sub.description.withdrawal: The order does not support withdrawal.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get notified for all updates
newsletter.privacy: We care about the protection of your data. Read our

left.title: Rental Energy - Notes
left.content1: Please use a decentralized wallet for transfers, otherwise the energy cannot reach your account accurately.
left.content2: The energy consumption depends on whether the recipient account has USDT. An account with USDT consumes 31895 energy, while one without consumes 64895 energy.
left.content3: Please transfer the corresponding amount to the platform address. The platform will distribute the corresponding amount of energy to your payment account within 6 seconds after the transfer is completed.
left.content4: If you don't know how to operate, you can click on the online customer service for 1-to-1 teaching!

middle.title: Calculate rental energy needs
middle.content1: Energy unit price (valid within 1 hour after distribution)
middle.content3: Each TRC20 USDT transaction consumes at least 31895 energy
middle.content4: For example, 5 USDT transfers are planned within the next hour
middle.content5: 5 transactions x 4 TRX per transaction = 20 TRX
middle.content6: This saves about 52.5 TRX compared to direct transfer

wallet.title: Decentralized Wallet User Guide
wallet.description: The following is a decentralized wallet that supports energy leasing and reduces transaction fees. Click on the corresponding wallet icon to view the text and image tutorial.
wallet.content1: If your wallet is not listed or you have trouble understanding the instructions, please contact
